params._taskId: The hash of the task, can be computed using getTaskId()

params._execAddress: On which contract should Gelato execute the transactions
params._execSelector: Which function Gelato should eecute on the _execAddress
params._resolverAddress: On which contract should Gelato check when to execute the tx
params._resolverData: Which data should be used to check on the Resolver when to execute the tx

params._execAddress: On which contract should Gelato execute the tx
params._execData: Data used to execute the tx, queried from the Resolver by Gelato
params._feeToken: Token used to pay for the execution. ETH = 0xeeeeee...
params._taskCreator: On which contract should Gelato check when to execute the tx
params._txFee: Fee paid to Gelato for execution, deducted on the TaskTreasury

params._func: String of the function you want the selector from

params._execAddress: Address of the contract to be executed by Gelato
params._selector: Function on the _execAddress which should be executed

cancelTask(bytes32).notice: Cancel a task so that Gelato can no longer execute it

createTask(address,bytes4,address,bytes).notice: Create a task that tells Gelato to monitor and execute transactions on specific contracts

getSelector(string).notice: Helper func to query the _selector of a function you want to automate

getTaskId(address,address,bytes4).notice: Returns TaskId of a task Creator

getTaskIdsByUser(address).notice: Helper func to query all open tasks by a task creator

userdoc.notice: PokeMe enables everyone to communicate to Gelato Bots to monitor and execute certain transactionsResolverAddresses determine when Gelato should execute and provides bots with the payload they should use to executeExecAddress determine the actual contracts to execute a function on
